settings.hero_subtitle: Leading the amusement industry in professional safety education since 2025. AAI provides comprehensive training programs that ensure both thrilling experiences and uncompromising safety standards.

settings.section_subtitle: Advancing safety excellence in the amusement industry through comprehensive professional education and certification programs.

settings.block_content: We set the gold standard for safety education in the amusement industry, ensuring every professional has the knowledge and skills to create safe, thrilling experiences.
Our comprehensive certification programs advance careers and establish industry expertise, recognized by leading amusement organizations worldwide.
We collaborate with industry leaders to develop cutting-edge safety protocols and best practices that shape the future of amusement operations.

settings.content_body: Founded in 2025, the Amusement Adventure Institute emerged from a critical need in the industry: comprehensive, accessible safety education that combines rigorous standards with practical application.

settings.block_content: AAI was established by industry veterans with over 50 years of combined experience in amusement park operations, safety management, and education.
Our programs are recognized by IAAPA, comply with ASTM F24 standards, and are trusted by leading amusement operators worldwide.
